src_original: asti kulaputra manuṣyaloke nāgasaṃkṣobhasaṃbhavahastigarbho nāma gandhaḥ,
tgt_original: 5 大象藏香大象藏香五人中有香。 名大象藏。 因龍鬪生。

src_original: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadaṃ mahāgandhaghanābhrajālasaṃchannaṃ kṛtvā saptāhaṃ sūkṣmagandhodakadhārāvarṣamabhipravarṣati
tgt_original: 若燒一丸。 興大光明細雲覆上。 味如甘露。 七日七夜降香水雨。

src_original: tatra yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śarīre vā cīvare vā gandhodakadhārā nipatanti,  te sarve suvarṇavarṇakusumavicitritā bhavanti /  yeṣu ca bhavanavimānakūṭāgāreṣu nipatanti,

tgt_original: 若著衣服宮殿樓閣。 亦悉金色。

src_original: ye 'pi sattvāsteṣāṃ gandhameghajālānāṃ mārutasamīritānāmantarbhavanagatā gandhaṃ jighranti,
